original_title: 名探偵コナン エピソード"ONE" 小さくなった名探偵
overview: Two-hour remake of the original 1st episode, in celebration of the anime celebrating 20 years in broadcast. The special retells what happened on the day Shinichi was transformed into the body of a child. The special includes new scenes that weren't in the original manga or the first anime episode.
tagline: World's greatest detecitve. World's smallest package.
title: Detective Conan: Episode One - The Great Detective Turned Small
